description: Works to shopfront including replacement of external fascia, and internal works to basement, ground and first floor.
decision_conditions: Based on the submitted information and lacking a proper assessment of the building's significance, the proposed works would cause harm to the historic plan form of the listed building, involve an unacceptable loss of historic fabric, and have the potential to cause harm to the retained fabric of the building by virtue of their detailed design. The proposals would therefore, adversely affect the special architectural and historic interest of the listed building, and cause harm to the significance of the heritage asset contrary to the objectives of Chapter 16 (Conserving and enhancing the historic environment) of the National Planning Policy Framework 2019, Policy 7.8 (Sustaining and enhancing the significance of heritage assets) of the London Plan 2016, Policy CS9 (Protecting and enhancing Islington's built and historic environment) of Islington's Core Strategy 2011 and Policy DM2.3 (Heritage) of Islington's Development Management Policies 2013.
